data.name: ETERNAL BLOOD - OST
data.detailed_description:
ETERNAL BLOOD - Original Soundtracks contains the memorable music from the game. It includes a collection of 17 MP3 tracks made by composer Andrew Matskevych. Coming soon more due to the Early Access.

Enjoy this amazing album!

Please note – The ETERNAL BLOOD - Official Soundtrack will be placed in your ETERNAL BLOOD folder in the Steam Directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\ETERNAL BLOOD\ETERNAL BLOOD OST

Credits:
All tracks by Andrew Matskevych
